/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the tranquil atmosphere of the city. The street is lined with lush green trees, their leaves rustling gently in the breeze, casting dappled shadows on the white fence that runs parallel to the sidewalk. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with a few wispy clouds, adding to the overall calmness of the scene. The sun shines brightly, its rays filtering through the leaves of the trees, creating a kaleidoscope of colors that dance across the landscape. The image is a beautiful representation of a typical day in Beijing, where nature and urban life coexist harmoniously.
